document.full_text: president dmitry medvedev spelled out differences with prime minister vladimir putin on wednesday over modernization of the economy and the fate of a jailed oil tycoon, but kept russia guessing which of them will run in the 2012 presidential election.
document.title: dmitry medvedev keeps russia guessing on 2012 election
lines_and_colors: president dmitry medvedev spelled out differences with prime minister vladimir putin on wednesday over modernization of the economy and the fate of a jailed oil tycoon, but kept russia guessing which of them will run in the 2012 presidential election.
